policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Decode JWT Request Object"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Target policy: OTK Decode JWT Request Object"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Decrypt if the JWT is encrypted"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${authorize_request}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="."/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="."/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="121"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Parameters>
            </L7p:Encapsulated>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:Split>
            <L7p:IgnoreEmptyValues booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:InputVariable stringValue="authorize_request"/>
            <L7p:OutputVariable stringValue="authorize_request.tokens"/>
            <L7p:SplitPattern stringValue="."/>
            <L7p:SplitPatternRegEx booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:Split>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthdXRob3JpemVfcmVxdWVzdC50b2tlbnNbMF19"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="encJwtHeaderEncoded"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:EncodeDecode>
            <L7p:CharacterEncoding stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="encJwtHeaderEncoded"/>
            <L7p:TargetContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="encJwtHeader"/>
            <L7p:TransformType transformType="BASE64_DECODE"/>
        </L7p:EncodeDecode>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="enc"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="encJwtHeader"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="encValue"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtlbmNWYWx1ZS5yZXN1bHR9"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="enc"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="enc"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//Extract enc value from the header"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${enc}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="ad5ec415-bf1c-4c23-a1e7-3a350eefd31e"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK openid request_object_encryption_enc_values_supported"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:Regex>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// replace "  with empty"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="request_object_encryption_enc_values_supported"/>
                            <L7p:Regex stringValue="["| ]"/>
                            <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Replacement stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                        </L7p:Regex>
                        <L7p:Split>
                            <L7p:IgnoreEmptyValues booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:InputVariable stringValue="request_object_encryption_enc_values_supported"/>
                            <L7p:OutputVariable stringValue="enc_methods"/>
                            <L7p:SplitPatternRegEx booleanValue="false"/>
                        </L7p:Split>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${enc_methods}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${enc}"/>
                            <L7p:MultivaluedComparison multivaluedComparison="ANY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${enc}"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Detail stringValue="JWT enc method is not supported"/>
                        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTc2"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//verify if the enc value is in the supported enc list"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                            <L7p:Expression stringValue="openid_registration.response.request_object_encryption_enc"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="client_key_custom_json"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="registered_enc_method"/>
                        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZWdpc3RlcmVkX2VuY19tZXRob2QucmVzdWx0fQ=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="registered_encryption_method"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="registered_encryption_method"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//extract registered enc method from client info"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${registered_encryption_method}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${enc}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${registered_encryption_method}"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${registered_encryption_method}"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Detail stringValue="JWT enc method is not supported"/>
                        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTc2"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//match encryption method with the registered enc method"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="38ac00db-06c4-48ed-81a1-4a83c66d0e58"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK openid request_object_encryption_alg_values_supported"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                            <L7p:Expression stringValue="alg"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="encJwtHeader"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="encAlgValue"/>
                        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtlbmNBbGdWYWx1ZS5yZXN1bHR9"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="encAlg"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Regex>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// replace "  with empty"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="request_object_encryption_alg_values_supported"/>
                            <L7p:Regex stringValue="["| ]"/>
                            <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Replacement stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                        </L7p:Regex>
                        <L7p:Split>
                            <L7p:IgnoreEmptyValues booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:InputVariable stringValue="request_object_encryption_alg_values_supported"/>
                            <L7p:OutputVariable stringValue="enc_algorithms"/>
                            <L7p:SplitPatternRegEx booleanValue="false"/>
                        </L7p:Split>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${enc_algorithms}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${encAlg}"/>
                            <L7p:MultivaluedComparison multivaluedComparison="ANY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${encAlg}"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="//Extract alg from the JWT header and match it with the supported enc alg list"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Detail stringValue="JWT enc algorithm value is not supported"/>
                        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTc3"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//verify if the enc alg value is in the supported enc alg list"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                            <L7p:Expression stringValue="openid_registration.response.request_object_encryption_alg"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="client_key_custom_json"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="registered_enc_alg"/>
                        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZWdpc3RlcmVkX2VuY19hbGcucmVzdWx0fQ=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="registered_encryption_alg"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="registered_encryption_alg"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//extract registered enc alg from client info"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${registered_encryption_alg}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${encAlg}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${registered_encryption_alg}"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${registered_encryption_alg}"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Detail stringValue="JWT enc algorithm value is not supported"/>
                        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTc3"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//match encryption alg with the registered enc alg"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:KeyGoid goidValue="0000000000000000ffffffffffffffff"/>
                    <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${authorize_request}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="decryptedRequestObject"/>
                    <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="Using Recipient Key From List"/>
                </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkZWNyeXB0ZWRSZXF1ZXN0T2JqZWN0LnBsYWludGV4dH0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="authorize_request"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkZWNyeXB0ZWRSZXF1ZXN0T2JqZWN0LnBsYWludGV4dH0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="authorizeRequest.payload"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//decrypt the JWT if the JWT header contains supported enc value and enc alg"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Decode Signed JWT"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${enc}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${authorize_request}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="{"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="{"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="//enc is not empty and cty is JWT i.e its nested JWT"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${authorize_request}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="."/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="."/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Encapsulated>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                        <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="121"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Parameters>
                    </L7p:Encapsulated>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:Split>
                    <L7p:IgnoreEmptyValues booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:InputVariable stringValue="authorize_request"/>
                    <L7p:OutputVariable stringValue="authorize_request.tokens"/>
                    <L7p:SplitPattern stringValue="."/>
                    <L7p:SplitPatternRegEx booleanValue="false"/>
                </L7p:Split>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthdXRob3JpemVfcmVxdWVzdC50b2tlbnNbMF19"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwtHeaderEncoded"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:CharacterEncoding stringValueNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="jwtHeaderEncoded"/>
                    <L7p:TargetContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="jwtHeader"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="BASE64_DECODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="alg"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="jwtHeader"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="algValue"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthbGdWYWx1ZS5yZXN1bHR9"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="signAlg"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="b9639b7a-f263-416b-ad2a-2822d7dda8a9"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK openid request_object_signing_alg_values_supported"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:Regex>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// replace "  with empty"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="request_object_signing_alg_values_supported"/>
                            <L7p:Regex stringValue="["| ]"/>

</wsp:Policy>
